listitem.para: Changed the default value of the Db_Descriptor_Relation->setOnDeleteAction to Db_Descriptor::NOTHING.

Fixed bug with transaction flag in Db_Connection not being triggered in Db_Connection->transactionStart. This caused the problem that no exceptions were thrown when nesting transactions (which aren't allowed).
Fixed bug with improper table name in UPDATE query for Has Many relations when using dbprefix. The dbprefix was missing.
Added a new method: Db::dump which dumps the content of objects and arrays of objects without their __* properties. It also displays a marker for changed properties on objects.
Fixed bug occurring when Db_MapperQuery::related was called consecutively on the same object with relations sharing parts of the same branch in the join tree (eg. "foo-bar" and "foo-baz").
This would cause an overwrite of the previous calls for the parts where they share branches (so in the example above, "foo-*" would disappear when calling "->related("foo-bar")").
Fixed syntax error (a stray single quote) which arose if the Db_Descriptor_Relation->setExtraConditions was used.
Added manual section for Db::dump.
Transaction support for the connection object, see Database Connection Objects: Transactions for more information.
ON DELETE RESTRICT support for the relations using Db_Descriptor_Relation->setOnDeleteAction.
ON DELETE CASCADE support for the relations using Db_Descriptor_Relation->setOnDeleteAction.
ON DELETE SET NULL support for the relationships using Db_Descriptor_Relation->setOnDeleteAction.
Added new constant Db_Descriptor::NOTHING, to use with Db_Descriptor_Relation->setOnDeleteAction, it will prevent it from doing anything. It will not cascade or restrict nor set null.
Made it possible to insert NULL in the database with the ORM, this by removing isset() calls, as the properties all should be declared in classes at compile-time.
Fixed bug with a variable ($related) being used by the code generated by the Has One relationship even though it was not initialized.
Fixed typo in the /compat/CodeIgniter/application/libraries/MY_Session.php file which resulted in a fatal error.

Added section
Database Connection Objects: Transactions
ON DELETE RESTRICT is now marked as functional.
ON DELETE CASCADE is now marked as functional.
Db_Descriptor_Relation->setOnDeleteAction now has two new settings: Db_Descriptor::SET_NULL and Db_Descriptor::NOTHING.
Added specialized Db_MapperQuery->count method which overrides the Db_Query_Select->count with a variant which uses proper key names to count by.
Added the methods:
Increased performance of Db::isChanged.
Removed logging methods.
It is better to let a framework / user code catch the errors using PHP instead of having to push them to the framework / user. Also, exceptions are used in almost all cases, making a logger obsolete.
Fixed faulty property name used in the instanceof $classname check in the save part for the Has One relationship type.
It generated "$object " instead of "$object->property".
Fixed malfunctioning FROM part in some ORM queries which occurred when the dbprefix was used.
Fixed broken Db::related method, it resulted in a PHP error because of a call to a missing method.
Added a more readable example of the nested where conditions, using method-chaining.
Added documentation for:
Initial Release
